Author: Arash Nabi
Summary: Copy-ToAzureBlob will copy files from $path to Azure Blob. The Azure powershell module should be installed, otherwise the script will fail. You can download it from https://www.powershellgallery.com/.Update with your information like Application ID, Tenant ID, Storage Account and
Title: Copy files to Azure Blob Storage
UserTags: Microsoft Azure, Azure Blob Storage, copy files
